#summary One-sentence summary of this page.

= Sintax =

{{{
     _\ Imports_
     *$*java.lang
     
     _\ Defining a new variable_
     x = 0
     
     _\ LOOP_
     x < 10 & x >= 0 *@*
        System.out.println(x)
        x = x + 1
     *@*
     
     _\ IF_
     x < 10 | x > 0 *?*
         System.out.println("X is less than 10!")
     *?* x > 10 & x = 10 *?*
         System.out.println("X is greater than 10!")
     *??*
         System.out.println("X = "+ x)
     *?*
     
     _\ FUNCTION_
     _\ Allowed:_
     _\ addWithX v1, v2 # ... #_
     _\ addWithX(v1 v2) # ... #_
     addWithX(v1, v2) *#*
         \ "~" is the return
         ~ x + v1 + v2
     *#*
     
     x = addWithX(1, 2)
     
     System.out.println("X = "+ x)
}}}

Null value:

     \ $ is the null value
     x = $
     

Arithmetic Operators:

     \ + Addition
     x = 0 + 1
     x += 1
     
     \ - Subtraction
     x = 0 - 1
     x -= 1
     
     \ * Multiplication
     x = 0 * 1
     x *= 1
     
     \ / Division
     x = 0 / 1
     x /= 1
     
     \ % Modulus
     x = 0 % 1
     x %= 1
     

Comparison Operators:

     \ = Equal to
     (x = y)
     
     \ ! Not equal to
     (x ! y)
     
     \ < Less Than
     (x < y)
     
     \ > Greater Than
     (x > y)
     
     \ < Less Than or Equal To
     (x <= y)
     
     \ > Greater Than or Equal To
     (x >= y)
     

Imports or include file:

     \ Import
     $java.lang
     
     \ Include file
     $"script.cj"
